title: Why Divorce Isn't the Answer
itunes:author: Guests: Jeff & Cheryl Scruggs
itunes:summary:
When you first got married, you hoped it would last for a lifetime. Sadly, many couples who say their vows are choosing to get a divorce. John, Erin and Greg offer encouragement to couples who are questioning if they will make it. Featuring Jeff and Cheryl Scruggs.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "I Do Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-08?refcd=1342801

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/why-divorce-isnt-the-answer/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/hope-for-every-marriage-digital-product/?refcd=1342801

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
